title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; identical API surface to the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat, and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, RAG, plugins).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal TUI for chatting, pulling, and switching models; keyboard-driven and scriptable.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s UI and inline suggestions.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example showing how to scale and batch Ollama models across a cluster.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that wraps Ollama as a Generator and Embedder for end-to-end RAG pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin coroutines support and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to the Ollama REST API with native streaming.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, vision, fine-tune, and edge deployment.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for private AI-assisted writing, summarization, and semantic note search.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake adding Ollama binaries and an OCI image to nixpkgs with CUDA and ROCm variants.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust client leveraging reqwest and tokio for ergonomic integration into Rust services.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Community-curated registry of custom GGUF models with CI validation and automated Ollama pushes.
